Oracle Enterprise Cloud touchstones

Mature, true enterprise cloud

Designed over 10 years, using modern best practice for global enterprises

'Data driven' business capability

Embedding insight across your global organisation

Enabling you to achieve a dynamic operating model

Realising value at every stage, giving you even greater control

What Oracle can provide Siemens

Standardisation

More than 1,000 pre-built applications

Delivering global data-definition and business process standardisation

Comprehensive oversight, governance, control and efficiency

All delivered with global compliance.

Flexibility

Extend and configure processes and functions to accommodate business specific requirements

All additions and configurations reflected automatically in the data model allowing seamless information flow.

Innovation

We deliver innovation with a regular cadence that does not disrupt your day-to-day operations

This means you can constantly improve business efficiency without disruption and associated cost.

Security

The highest level of security delivered by having control over each layer of the technology stack

Including autonomous data management allowing proactive response to ongoing, changing threats.

Driving towards your success with agility and ingenuity, together

Oracle's approach to the Siemens RFI

Immediate fulfilment of our SHERPA#2 manifesto to meet your top business needs for a mature and completely flexible ERP Cloud

View Oracle’s SHERPA#2 response highlights

SIEMENS' RFI

Our response

With Oracle, all your challenges can be met at strategic, operational and technological levels faster, delivering huge operational gains including speed, 'cost efficiency' and future-proofing by delivering three connected elements:

First, we will deliver a true ENTERPRISE CLOUD, the only enterprise cloud in the world that has been specifically built to meet the needs of enterprises like Siemens.

Second, we will provide a completely data-driven business platform capability , using modern best practice to shape and deliver technology, applications and data.

Third, we will deploy incrementally so you can digest change more easily and realise value continually, ensuring our platform and cloud model adapt to meet your evolving priorities, delivering not a rigid Target Operating Model, but a Dynamic Operating Model, fit for a dynamic world.

Delivering capability aligned to
your requirements

  • Balancing standardisation and individuality

    • Highly standardised platform.
    • Configurable and extendible functions and applications deliver to individual operating company needs rapidly.
    • No matter how individual functions are added, your platform stays integrated.

  • Risk-mitigated disruptive thinking

    • Automatically adding disruptive and innovative enhancements – with zero impact to you.
    • Oracle takes the risk and investment burden. You take the advantage of disruptive technology integrating it seamlessly into your business.

  • One unified platform

    • Building a single ERP backbone - designed with lean business process and rapid deployment capability.
    • No monolithic design and no heavy customisation – your backbone remains agile, innovative and secure.

  • Clear compelling case for investment in ERP

    • Delivering in stages to show continuous, rapid ROI incrementally.
    • Delivering agile ERP backbone, adding functions as part of Enterprise Cloud, in line with changing needs and compelling business cases for change.

  • Our team driving your transformation

    • Working together to drive your transformation with a rolling roadmap of continuous innovation, delivery and change.
    • Close working relationships founded on trust and integrity.
    • Regular dialogue and meetings at all levels of the business.

Customer track record

Discover how customers are using Oracle to transform their businesses and engage customers in new and better ways.

Industrial manufacturing leadership

40+ years of industry expertise

General Electric

General Electric rolled out Oracle ERP Cloud across its business to reduce costs and scale.

Learn more

Western Digital

Oracle ERP Cloud enabled Western Digital to implement in phases, resulting in a bigger impact on the business with immediate effect.

Learn more

HarbisonWalker International

Oracle ERP Cloud, Sales Cloud and HCM Cloud underpinned a far-reaching supply chain and business transformation for HarbisonWalker.

Learn more

Qualcomm

Qualcomm has started transforming specific global finance functions with Oracle Cloud ERP, proving business value to drive continued momentum.

Learn more

Hindalco

Hindalco selected Oracle ERP Cloud to increase business agility, reduce costs and access innovation.

Learn more

Titan International

Titan International adopted Oracle ERP, EPM, and SCM Cloud to strengthen control and transparency while driving innovation.

Learn more

Precision Group

Precision Group relies on Oracle Manufacturing Cloud for greater flexibility and agility.

Learn more

Schneider Electric

Schneider Electric are transforming its supply chain with Oracle SCM Cloud.

Learn more

Learn more

Learn more

Learn more

Meet your team

As Siemens' partner, we will work as an extended part of your internal team in a close relationship based on integrity and trust. Through regular dialogue at all levels, we will build a shared vision of how best we can realise value for Siemens, today and in the future.
